changeSet.author: Lucas Lopatka
changeSet.sql: SELECT ( assignment_id, title, work_section_code, location_id, courtroom_id, court_role_code, jail_role_code, other_assign_code, escort_run_id, effective_date, expiry_date, created_by, updated_by, created_dtm, updated_dtm, revision_count ) INTO temp_assignment FROM assignment
SELECT ( courtroom_id, courtroom_cd, courtroom_name, location_id, created_by, updated_by, created_dtm, updated_dtm, revision_count ) INTO temp_courtroom FROM courtroom
SELECT ( court_role_code, description, effective_date, expiry_date, created_by, updated_by, created_dtm, updated_dtm, revision_count ) INTO temp_court_role_code FROM court_role_code
SELECT ( jail_role_code, description, effective_date, expiry_date, created_by, updated_by, created_dtm, updated_dtm, revision_count ) INTO temp_jail_role_code FROM jail_role_code
SELECT ( escort_run_id, title, location_id, created_by, updated_by, created_dtm, updated_dtm, revision_count ) INTO temp_escort_run FROM escort_run
SELECT ( other_assign_code, description, effective_date, expiry_date, created_by, updated_by, created_dtm, updated_dtm, revision_count ) INTO temp_other_assign_code FROM other_assign_code
